Text: I couldn't get this to work but that's probably just my lack of familiarity with DOS.

All of free Elder Scrolls games are available at www.elderscrolls.com. I just downloaded the first part, Arena, and it's all working splendidly. Will try with the others, but given the fact that it's the official Elder Scrolls site, they are all pretty much guaranteed to work. No need to waste time with this torrent, check the page above. Sorry man, but it's just the way it is.
